channel.title: CWE-205 on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in CWE-205 on ZAP

item.title: Access Control Issue - Improper Authorization
item.description: Insufficient Authorization results when an application does not perform adequate authorization checks to ensure that the user is performing a function or accessing data in a manner consistent with the security policy. Authorization procedures should enforce what a user, service or application is permitted to do. When a user is authenticated to a web site, it does not necessarily mean that the user should have full access to all content and functionality.

item.title: GraphQL Server Implementation Identified
item.description: The server is using “Example GraphQL Engine”, which is a GraphQL implementation for “Example Technology 1” and “Example Technology 2”.
